title: Pudichiruka Illa Pudikalaya Lyrics Kalakalappu 2
stanzas:
pudichirukka illa pudikkalaya
illa pudichatha pol nadikkiriya
sirikkiriya illa morakiriya
moraippadha pola rasikkiriya

ah ah
adi onnume puriyala
ah ah....
adi sathiyama theriyala
ah ah..
ippa vera vazhi illa
neeye sollidumaa

yena naan tubelightu
en mansu whiteu
neethaan en sightu
konjam vaamaa
sari edhuku fightu
nee sonnaa rightu
yen life-ukke lightu

hema
sariyaamaa
adiye hema
naan un maamaa
aagalaamaa

aishwaryaa
are you readya?
un veeta vittu enkoodathaan
neeyum variyaa

aishwaryaa
ne en kadhaliyaa
sirikkura sirippula
sethaiyura naan.

sariyaa maa
adiye hema
naan un maamaa
aagalaamaa

paatha udane pudikkum
figure-unga
boomiyala neraya per
porappaanga.

pesa pesa pudikkum
ponnungathaan
romba romba kammiyaa
iruppaanga.

scooty pulser-a piece aakkum
oru sweety un hearta
loose aakkum.
ava beauty un mansa
lesaakkum
love-e life-a mass aakkum

sirikkura silaiye
veesura valaiye
unna mattum manasukul
nenappene

therikkura alaiye
adikkura mazhaiye
unakkula naan vandhu
kudhippene

ulagathil porakkum
ponnunga yaarum
unakunu porakka maataanga.
kedaikkura gapula
noola vidudaa
kandippaa thirumbi paappaanga.

aishwaryaa
are you readya?
un veeta vittu enkoodathaan
neeyum variyaa

aishwaryaa
ne en kadhaliyaa
sirikkura sirippula
sethaiyura naan.

sariyaa maa
adiye hema
naan un maamaa
aagalaamaa

ahhaaa
adiye hema
naan un maamaa
aagalaamaa

yena naan tubelightu
en mansu whiteu
neethaan en sightu
konjam vaamaa
sari edhuku fightu
nee sonnaa rightu
yen life-ukke lightu
hema...

sariyaa maa
adiye hema
naan un maamaa
aagalaamaa
